QuestData.Title: Sharpening Your Talons
QuestData.Description: The primordial drakes occupy most of the area to the north and east, and I can feel the heat of their breath even at this distance. Before we can challenge the mightiest among the drakes, we must test our skills against the lesser creatures.$B$BStill, don't let your guard down; any one of these beasts can devour a man whole. Once you've familiarized yourself with the combat tactics of these drakes, return and I will tell you our next step.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Primordial Drakes and then speak with Dorian Drakestalker at Dorian's Outpost.
QuestData.RewardText: I can hear the confidence in your words. Good, the experience will come in handy when we face the queen of the drakes.
